alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 21 at 9:05AM PDT until July 22 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT SATURDAY... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Temperatures in the mid 90s to around 104 degrees possible. In addition, warm overnight low temperatures will not add much relief from the heat. Hot weather will likely continue into Sunday. * WHERE...Lake Casitas, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Calabasas and Agoura Hills, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, until 8 PM PDT Saturday. For the Excessive Heat Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
